subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Luge Racing
Bobsledding
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Erin Hamlin won the World Cup luge women’s singles race on Saturday in Lake Placid, N.Y., leading a sweep of the podium by the United States.
snippet: Erin Hamlin won the World Cup luge women’s singles race on Saturday in Lake Placid, N.Y., leading a sweep of the podium by the United States.
